title: [Kalista Proposal] Soul-Bonding Lissandra Special Option
body:
Since the ally accepting Kalista's soul-bond is agreeing to have some of their agency taken away for the greater good, why can't we have the same for Kalista when she soul-bonds with Lissandra?

By which I mean: make it a special exception for Lissandra when she is soul-bond, and let her cast her ultimate on Kalista.

Imagine the sheer amount of out-plays that can happen with a Lissandra (with Zhonya's) and a Kalista. It would foster the exact kind of teamwork and cooperation Kalista's soul-bond mechanic is meant to evoke!

replies.body: Honestly, I'm just satisfied with the idea of being able to fire an ULTIMATE LISSACANNON ICENUKE.

Haha, I agree, that's an amazing combo, but imagine how it would be if Lissandra and Kalista could outplay/stall the enemy team by alternating ults on each other to keep the other away from harm while Liss cc's them and Kalista kites them to death?
i would perfer an ap malphite ult into her ult, that shit would be scary af. think about it, well from what i've seen from the video, her ult doesn't do any damage or does very little damage.
It does have a tiny knock-up, which can trigger a Yasuo ult. It's mostly for the cc aspect, like Ashe's or Varus's ults.
